base_description: Tall, silver refrigerator with a sleek design.
part_description: Features two vertical doors, with a handle on each. A digital display and dispenser are located on the left door. The interior likely includes shelves and compartments.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors open to reveal separate compartments for refrigeration and freezing, each with adjustable shelves and bins for organizing food. The digital display controls temperature settings, while the dispenser provides water or ice, connected to an internal water line.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with users through door handles and digital display for settings. Requires external water line for the dispenser. Fits into kitchen spaces, interacting with surrounding cabinetry and appliances. Users access contents and control temperature, enhancing food preservation.
